body_text:
What chapter of the manga does the anime of Nanatsu no Taizai (Seven Deadly Sins) end on? I just finished watching 24 episodes of Nanatsu no Taizai (Seven Deadly Sins). I would like to continue by reading the manga but I am unsure which chapter to start from.
Also, I read online that there is a lot missing in the anime compared to the manga. Is that true?
What manga chapter does the Nanatsu no Taizai anime end on? Hoping to know what chapter it is. I want to continue it from there even if the anime skip some chapters more or less. :)
